name: The World Legacy
text: You can only control 1 "The World Legacy". Each time a face-up Level 5 or higher monster(s) is sent from the field to the GY, place 1 counter on this card for each sent card (max. 7). You can send this card with 7 counters to the GY; Special Summon 1 Cyberse Link Monster from your Extra Deck.
